description.description: The description for the customer group.  This property is read-only for system groups.

id.description:
The user specific identifier for the customer group, which must be unique across the organization.  Property
 is read-only.

in_deletion.description: The deletion status of this customer group.

link.description: URL that is used to get this instance.  This property is computed and cannot be modified.

member_count.description: The number of members in this customer group.

rule.description: The rule of this customer group. Only available for dynamic customer groups.

description.description: The description of the rule, describing its conditions in natural language. Property is read-only.

type.description: The type of the customer group.  This property is read-only.
